channel.title: Please Help Client Cache Download
channel.description:
I am currently trying to get my client to just start downloading cache, automatically but it's currently not working for me. I'm pretty sure I did nothing wrong but I would love it if someone could assist me. Thank you.
[code]java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\ClimaxCache\ClimaxCache.zip?dl=1 (The system c annot find the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:212) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:104) at CacheDownloader.downloadFile(CacheDownloader.java:129) at CacheDownloader.downloadCache(CacheDownloader.java:103) at client.startUp(client.java:7870) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:36) at client.run(client.java:5196) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) The cache was not downloaded correctly. Please download it manually at: C:/ClimaxCache/ClimaxCache.zip?dl=1 File Directory: C:/ClimaxCache/[/code]

item.title: Please Help Client Cache Download
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

I am currently trying to get my client to just start downloading cache, automatically but it’s currently not working for me. I’m pretty sure I did nothing wrong but I would love it if someone could assist me. Thank you.
